name: The Legend of Azarias DEMO
description:
This is a short demo/test to a short game I wanted to make to test out some mechanics and stuff.

In this demo:

>Intro and tutorial

>One main floor

>2 main bosses, 3 side bosses

>3 side quests

>13 songs

>12 normal enemies

The finished game will include at least 13 floors, the rest if still being worked on and planned.
